alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; Northern Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 1:24AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phillips, Petroleum, Garfield and southwestern Valley Counties through 230 AM MDT... At 122 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Belknap to 6 miles south of Mosby. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Observed. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malta, Jordan, Winnett, Whitewater, Zortman, Saco, Dodson, Sand Springs, Fourchette, U L Bend Rec Area, Loring, Brusett, Crooked Creek Rec Area, Flatwillow, Devils Creek Rec Area, Port Of Morgan, Edwards, Mosby, Phillips, and Wagner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A wind gust to 52 mph was observed at the Hays DOT. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; Northern Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips
